p:
In Sub-Saharan Africa, all of these models predict high suitability in the area between roughly Senegal, the Ethiopian Plateau, the Congo Basin and the mouth of the Congo River, as well as Madagascar and a strip along the eastern coast between Kenya and Swaziland. Suitable areas also include parts of Angola and Zambia in the two vector models by Kraemer et al.
36 , while our model (Fig.Â 2) and the Ae. aegypti model
36 predict higher suitability closer to the Sahara Desert in the north.
